item.title: Interactive COVID-19 maps by piggybacking (Part 1)
item.description: The COVID-19 pandemic cast a spotlight on the need for reliable data and responsible analysis to track and minimize the loss of human life. Among the many datasets and reports made available in recent months, this authorâ€™s work caught my attention, compiling large amounts of data into one report that was easy to maintain.
